mapper.insert: insert into userdata(name, password, phone_no, email, activate_key, session_key, status, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by,group_user,branch_mall) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{phoneNo}, #{email}, #{activateKey}, #{sessionKey}, #{status}, #{createdOn}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedOn}, #{updatedBy},#{groupUser},#{branchMall})
mapper.sql: id, name, phone_no as phoneNo,email,activate_key as activateKey,session_key as sessionKey,status,time_gen_session_key as timeGenSessionKey, created_on as createdOn, created_by as createdBy,updated_on as updatedOn, updated_by as updatedBy, group_user as groupUser, branch_mall as branchMall
mapper.select: select , password from userdata where email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE userdata SET status = #{status} ,updated_on = #{updatedOn} WHERE email = #{email}
